Author: Xyrr6134
Description: This mod makes it easier to recognize an opponent's civilization by displaying the abbreviated names of civilizations on top of their emblem in the in-game score display. Experience may vary on resolutions other than 1920x1080 and a UI scale of 100%. Note that, as a collateral effect, these emblems may also appear elsewhere in the game, sometimes blurry.
Title: Better Civ Emblems
